lead_paragraph: The company said that holders of 53 percent of unaffiliated NetSuite shares agreed to tender their shares, and the deal will be completed on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Oracle Is on Track to Acquire NetSuite, a Cloud Company
headline.main: Oracle on Track to Acquire NetSuite, a Cloud Storage Company

snippet: The company said that holders of 53 percent of unaffiliated NetSuite shares agreed to tender their shares, and the deal will be completed on Monday....
abstract: Software giant Oracle says it is moving forward with $9.3 billion acquisition of NetSuite after 53 percent of cloud storage company's shareholders agreed to tender their shares.
